scenario: In 2023, Diana has wages of $60,356.76. Diana also has an interest in a passive activity which generated a loss of $38,462.97 for the year. Diana has passive income from another source of $16,878.84.
question: Calculate the amount of the passive activity loss that is deductible in 2023 under I.R.C. § 469(a).
answer_explanation: Passive losses are limited to passive income. With $16,878.84 in passive income, only $16,878.84 of the $38,462.97 loss is deductible.
reasoning: Limited passive loss to passive income.
